thread.title_full: very nice Hotel - Review of Doubletree by Hilton - London Islington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: MrMmrsM
title: very nice Hotel
text:
5 mins from angel tube station and the hight street. Check in was very cold and impersonal but was quick. Standard room is clean, with a large comfy bed, flat screen tv, desk, safe, coffee making facilities. Bathroom only had a shower. Room overlooked building site next door to hotel, but there was no noise. But would suggest you ask for a room not overlooking this.
Room Tip: ask for a room not overlooking building site next door to hotel. See more room tips
